content:
长平名第七年
02-62- 18 0 5
MEMORANDUM June 12, 2
To
: Mr. R. L. Hirshberg, Program Officer, US AID/C
From
: C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Division Original signed by C. C. Chang
Subject
: Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX (99-471
SAC requested procurement of the following itens as listed in the attached Excess Property Bulletin Special. Listing No. 6-62:
(1) Crane shovel, basic unit - one each (GSA Control No. 7-62-1160)
(2) Shovel front - one each (GSA Control No. 7-62-1129)
(3) Jib - one each (GSX Control No. 7-62-1131)
(4) Fairlead sheave - one each (GSA Control No. 62-7-3897)
If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan.
Encl. Bulletin CC : JGW SDC BES 2D
CSK/sml. E-16.13.2

275
